price: Ewe mtu! Hakika wewe unajikusuru kwa juhudi kumwendea Mola wako Mlezi, basi utamkuta.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
footnotes: Ewe mtu! Hakika wewe unafanya juhudi katika vitendo vyako vikufikishie lengo lako. Basi utakuja kukutana na Mola wako Mlezi kwa a'mali yako, naye atakulipa kwayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan famulāqīhi
